customTitlebar.name: Custom titlebar
customTitlebar.description: Disable to use the native titlebar.

minimizeToTray.name: Minimize to tray
minimizeToTray.description: When disabled, GoofCord will close like any other window when closed, otherwise, it'll sit back and relax in your system tray for later.

startMinimized.name: Start minimized
startMinimized.description: GoofCord starts in the background and remains out of your way.

dynamicIcon.name: Dynamic icon
dynamicIcon.description:
When enabled shows pings/mentions count on GoofCord's icon and its tray. Overwrites the custom icon.
On Linux pings on the taskbar icon only show when Unity launcher is used

customIconPath.name: Custom Icon
customIconPath.description: Select an alternative icon for GoofCord to use. Formats with transparency are recommended.

discordUrl.name: Discord URL
discordUrl.description: URL that GoofCord will load on launch. Variations: https://canary.discord.com/app, https://ptb.discord.com/app or https://discord.com/app

modNames.name: Client mods
modNames.description: What client mods to use. You shouldn't disable Shelter as it is used by many GoofCord features. Do not mix forks of the same mod (e.g. Vencord and Equicord). Client mod I want to use is not listed.

customCssBundle.name: Custom CSS bundle
customCssBundle.description: A raw link to the JS bundle and CSS bundle of a client mod you want to use.

customFirewallRules.name: Custom firewall rules
customFirewallRules.description: When enabled allows the modification of firewall rules, otherwise, the default rules are used.

blocklist.name: Blocklist
blocklist.description: A list of URLs to block. Each entry must be separated by a comma.

blockedStrings.name: Blocked strings
blockedStrings.description: If any of those strings are in the URL, it will be blocked.

allowedStrings.name: Allowed strings
allowedStrings.description: If any of those strings are in the URL and it was matched by blocked strings, it will not be blocked.

installDefaultShelterPlugins.name: Install default Shelter plugins
installDefaultShelterPlugins.description: Adds GoofCord's helper plugins to Shelter on launch. Don't disable unless facing issues.

invidiousEmbeds.name: Invidious embeds
invidiousEmbeds.description: Replaces YouTube embeds with Invidious embeds.

encryptionPasswords.name: Encryption passwords
encryptionPasswords.description: Securely stored, encrypted list of passwords that will be used for encryption. A backup in a warm, safe place is recommended. Separate entries with commas.

encryptionCover.name: Encryption cover
encryptionCover.description: A message that a user without the password will see. Minimum two words or empty.

encryptionMark.name: Encryption Mark
encryptionMark.description: A string that will be prepended to each decrypted message so it's easier to know what messages are encrypted.

arrpc.name: Activity display
arrpc.description: Enables the use of an open source reimplementation of Discord's rich presence called arRPC. A workaround is needed for arRPC to work on Flatpak

launchWithOsBoot.name: Launch GoofCord on startup
launchWithOsBoot.description: When enabled starts GoofCord on OS boot automatically.

spellcheck.name: Spellcheck
spellcheck.description: Whether to enable spellcheck for input fields or not.

popoutWindowAlwaysOnTop.name: Pop out window always on top
popoutWindowAlwaysOnTop.description: When enabled, voice chat pop out window will always stay above other windows.

updateNotification.name: Update notification
updateNotification.description: If enabled, when a new version releases, a notification will pop up telling you that an update is available. Pings github.com

autoscroll.name: Auto-scroll
autoscroll.description: Enables auto-scrolling with middle mouse button.

transparency.name: Transparency
transparency.description: Makes the window transparent so it's possible to use translucent themes.

cloudHost.name: Cloud Host
cloudHost.description: DO NOT MESS WITH THIS UNLESS YOU KNOW WHAT YOU'RE DOING

cloudEncryptionKey.name: Cloud Encryption Key
cloudEncryptionKey.description: Leave empty to not use encryption and not save message encryption passwords on cloud. You can't recover your password if you lose it.
